member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3Reader.S3config
member.summary: Configure S3 authentication and encryption details

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3File.UpdateMetadata
member.summary: Updates the exists and modified date

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider
member.summary: Allows clients to request objects located on another amazon S3 server through this server. Allows URL rewriting.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.FilterPath(System.String)
member.summary: Execites the PreS3RequestFilter event and returns the result.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.#ctor(LitS3.S3Service,System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan,ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.RewriteBucketAndKeyPath,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create and configure a virtual path provider.
member.param: Provide the authentication and ecryption settings. For public buckets, no settings are required. UseSSL should be false for best performance.
The virtual folder to allow client access of s3 from.
You should validate that the requested bucket is your own. If you only want one bucket, just prefix your bucket to the path.

If true, existence of bucket and key is assumed as long as prefix is present. Also, no modified date information is provided to the image resizer, so the cache never gets updated. Requires 1 request instead of 2 to download the image.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.#ctor(ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.RewriteBucketAndKeyPath,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Default settings: UseSSL=false, VirtualFileSystemPrefix = "~/s3", SlidingExpiration = 1h, AbsoluteExpiration = maxvalue No bucket filtering is performed, so any amazon-hosted bucket can be accessed through this provider unless you add a bucket filter.
member.param: You should validate that the requested bucket is your own. If you only want one bucket, just prefix your bucket to the path.

If true, existence of bucket and key is assumed as long as prefix is present. Also, no modified date information is provided to the image resizer, so the cache never gets updated. Requires 1 request instead of 2 to download the image.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.IsPathVirtual(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a specified virtual path is within the virtual file system.
member.returns: true if the virtual path is within the virtual file sytem; otherwise, false.

member.name: E:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.PreS3RequestFilter
member.summary: Important! You should handle this event and throw an exception if a bucket that you do not own is requested. Otherwise other people's buckets could be accessed using your server.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.VirtualFilesystemPrefix
member.summary: Requests starting with this path will be handled by this virtual path provider. Must be in app-relative form: "~/s3/"

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.MetadataAbsoluteExpiration
member.summary: Existence and modified date metadata about files is cached for, at longest, this amount of time after it is first stored.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.MetadataSlidingExpiration
member.summary: Existence and modified date metadata about files is cached for this long after it is last accessed.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.Service
member.summary: Gets and sets the S3Service object that specifies connection details such as authentication, encryption, etc.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3VirtualPathProvider.FastMode
member.summary: If true, existence of bucket and key is assumed as long as prefix is present. Defaults to true. Also, no modified date information is provided, so the cache never gets updated. Requires 1 request instead of 2 to download the image.

members.member: Since we can't watch S3. If you want to invalidate the cache through code or sql, modify this class. For the ASP.NET cache, not the image resizer disk cache.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs
member.summary: Class to allow modifying the bucket and key request path

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new instance of S3PathEventArgs for modifying the bucket and key of incoming requests

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.AssertBucketMatches(System.String[])
member.summary: Stops the request if it doesn't match one of the allowed buckets. Amazon S3 is case-sensitive. Thus, comparisons are case sensitive as well. To minimize headache, a different exception is thrown when only case differs.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.ThrowException
member.summary: Throws an HTTP 403 Not Authorized exception. Call this if an invalid bucket request comes through.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.ThrowInvalidCaseException
member.summary: Like ThrowException, but hints that the bucket casing is wrong.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.PrefixBucket(System.String)
member.summary: Prefixes the specified bucket to the requested path.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.Path
member.summary: Path contains the bucket and key in the form "bucket/key". Where key may contain additional forward slashes.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.Bucket
member.summary: Parses the bucket from Path

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.S3Reader.S3PathEventArgs.Key
member.summary: Parses the key from Path
